title: U.S. Christmas lights energy costs
summary: The statistic shows circulation of espn magazine in the country in the first half of 2015 , by type . The magazine sold 2.13 million copies over its subscription service and 5.6 thousand copies at newsstands . Its total paid circulation amounted to 2.14 million copies .

data.Lighting Type: Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each)
